analysis.key_quote: Schedule Policy/Career (also known as Schedule F) would change tens of thousands of civil service jobs from merit-based to loyalty-based, leading to an enormous increase in waste, fraud and abuse.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the shift from a merit-based system to a loyalty-based one, which aligns with themes of politicization and the importance of maintaining civil service protections.
